definition.doc: Draft extension of NXentry to include fields to describe laboratory based experiments.

field.name: experiment_location
field.doc: City and country where ex. Took place

field.name: experiment_start_date
field.doc: Start date and time of ex. in ISO 8601 format, ideally including UTC offset.

field.name: experiment_end_date
field.doc: Start date and time of ex. in ISO 8601 format, ideally including UTC offset.

field.name: run_cycle
field.doc: Some facilities organize their beamtime into run cycles.

field.name: experiment_institution
field.doc: Name of the institution hosting the facility

field.name: experiment_laboratory
field.doc: Name of the laboratory or beamline

field.name: title
field.doc: Title of the entry, referring to a specific measurement.

field.name: start_time
field.doc: Start date and time of ex. in ISO 8601 format, ideally including UTC offset.

field.name: definition
field.doc: Does the file correspond to a standardized structure?
